definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: They flew into Mogadishu in Black Hawk helicopters in broad daylight.
sentences.chinese: 他們在大白天乘坐黑鷹直升機飛入了摩加迪沙。

sentences.english: One of the bone-marrow samples went into the Black Hawk.
sentences.chinese: 一份骨髓樣本放在黑鷹上。

sentences.english: The Black Hawks departed from Jalalabad thirty minutes later.
Black soot from the detonated Black Hawk charred the wall of the animal pen.
sentences.chinese: 黑鷹爆炸的黑煙燒焦了畜欄的牆。

sentences.english: After a long day at the range you relax by watching "Blackhawk Down".
sentences.chinese: 行軍一整天后，你看《黑鷹墜落》來放鬆。

sentences.english: Is that a big, black eagle bird?
The black eagle helped in those early years of the deicide comes behind afresh.
sentences.chinese: 當年黑鷹幫的那個殺神又回來了。

sentences.english: Next the SEALs needed to destroy the damaged Black Hawk.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，海豹需要摧毀損壞了的黑鷹。

sentences.english: Aidid’s forces fought back, downing two of the Black Hawks.
sentences.chinese: 艾迪德的部隊進行反擊，擊落了兩架黑鷹直升機。
